title: NA server switch to Korea
body:
im in the army, and im going to Korea in a month.
i read that you cant switch servers, nor can you make an account on Korean servers with out a KSSN or ARN..
is there any way around this that people know of? i assume it extends to other games as well.. (wow, starcraft, overwatch)
thanks

replies.body: I've heard of people selling korean SSNs but that sounds like a hella sketchy thing to get yourself involved with just to play league

Unfortunately, I'm not too familiar with the Korean Server's requirements as of this moment. I know that the equivalent of a Korean SSN was required in the past, but I'd recommend reaching out to the [**Korean Support Team**](http://leagueoflegends.co.kr/Customer/qna_login.php) if you have any further questions.
